dc-workflow.title: Meeting Workflow
dc-workflow.description: One CT will cover both meeting types. First selection is “Community Meeting” or “Board-Only Meeting”. Also covers the Notes, Agenda, and Minutes Used with DocentIMS.

state.title: Private
state.description: Visible only to content creator. Stays private until person ready to get comments.

state.title: Review
state.description: This sends the content for final internal review (at a higher company level) before submitted to the client. Only the team can see this content – not client.

state.title: Published
state.description: This is the final state for all content. This means the content type has been reviewed and revised as required. The content is now ready for everyone to see the content based on their permissions.

state.title: Closed
state.description: Work on the Content item is complete.

state.title: Archived
state.description: As if deleted. This removes it from the system the PrjMgr can still see and retrieve the document.

transition.title: Archive
transition.description: Moves content to Archived state. Only certain people can do this.

transition.title: Close
transition.description: The content has been completed and closing removes it from reporting requirements.

transition.title: Publish
transition.description: Moves to publish. Allows all people, based on permissions to see content.

transition.title: Retract
transition.description: Allows the owner or the PrjMgr to retract content to make changes or remove it.

transition.title: Review
transition.description: The content is ready for review by whomever is assigned.
